context: Browser tab title for 'View Questionnaire Response' page
Primary heading at top of 'View Questionnaire Response' page
Text within button to visit 'Edit Questionnaire Response' page

value: Text marked in bold underneath each question indicate your provided answers.
context: Helper text to explain that in the 'View Questionnaire Response' page, bold text marks answers collected from the applicant's response

Heading of the popup which displays when an applicant attempts to edit a questionnaire response for a questionnaire which was modified by the Credit Union since the last time the applicant submitted their initial response

value: The questionnaire associated with your previous responses has been modified by the Credit Union since you last responded. As a consequence of this, your individual responses cannot be restored, and you will be required to re-submit answers to all questions it contains.
context: Body text of the popup which displays when an applicant attempts to edit a questionnaire response for a questionnaire which was modified by the Credit Union since the last time the applicant submitted their initial response

Final line of confirmation text within the popup which displays when an applicant attempts to edit a questionnaire response for a questionnaire which was modified by the Credit Union since the last time the applicant submitted their initial response
